name: Squirreled Away
description:
Controls

Move / Navigate Menus: Arrows

Grab: Z 

Throw: X 

Start / Pause: S

Overview

A tribute to retro puzzle games like Magical Drop and Money Puzzle Exchanger. 

Features two play modes: Puzzle for chill, Speed for hectic!

Grab a bunch of the same kind and throw to create breaks of 3 or more. Get combos to multiply your points. Watch out for special blocks in later levels ;)

Pick your music track from the start screen, or turn it off.
